channel.title: Help :D
channel.description: i know this is wrong section but my server is 0.0.0.0 i can login with that but mopar server status doesnt logs in with it help me plz

item.title: Help :D
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

go to the tut section there is a usefull post there on port forwoerding, then just go to no-ip.com or org or w/e it is and make an account get the dl and make a server ip
the local host ip’s only let you log in they are 0.0.0.0 and 127.0.0.1

Read full topic

item.title: Help :D
item.dc:creator: @Graham Graham
item.description:
@Graham wrote:

0.0.0.0 is the IP used to listen on all interfaces (so if your computer is connected to more than one network a server can accept connections from all networks).

You can find out your external IP on whatsmyip.org, and your internal IP (and your router’s IP) using the ipconfig command in command prompt.

Use the external IP for the status list, portforward port 43594 to the internal IP using the ipconfig command.

Read full topic
